title: SSO Login for Staff
description: Enable SSO login for internal users to reduce password resets and improve access control.

title: Bulk Upload of User Stories
description: Allow PMs to upload CSV files of user stories into the backlog tool.
notes: Speeds up initial setup and adoption.

title: RICE Score Auto-Calculator
description: Automatically calculate RICE scores based on user-provided inputs.
notes: Core feature; calculation must remain transparent and explainable.

title: MoSCoW Grouping View
description: Group backlog items into Must, Should, Could, and Won't categories with validation checks.
notes: Flag too many Musts; encourage realistic scoping.

title: Comparison View: RICE vs MoSCoW
description: Display a side-by-side comparison of RICE ranking versus MoSCoW categories.

title: Export Results to PDF
description: Export prioritization results and insights into a PDF for leadership sharing.
notes: Useful but not required for v1.

title: Capacity Constraint (Sprint/Release)
description: Limit the number of Must items based on sprint or release capacity.

title: Input Validation & Guardrails
description: Validate missing or invalid inputs (e.g., effort=0, confidence outside 0â€“100).

title: Stakeholder Weighting
description: Apply stakeholder weights (e.g., compliance, customer value) to prioritization.
notes: Out of scope for v1 due to complexity.

title: AI Assist: Suggest Inputs
description: Use AI to suggest Reach, Impact, and Confidence from story text (advisory only).
notes: Future enhancement; avoid black-box decisions in v1.
